name: CDBurnerXP Audio Compilation File
summary: Learn about .AXP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: AXP files are stored in an XML format.
NOTE: CDBurnerXP stores data disc compilations with the .DXP extension.

description: Audio compilation file created by CDBurnerXP, a program used to burn discs; contains a list of audio files, including the file path, title, artist, duration, and track number; also stores the compilation date created and the total audio playback time.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .axp file in Corel Pinnacle Studio 26
images.caption: AXP file open in Corel Pinnacle Studio 26
